title: ChatBot Build Settings
description: Settings used to build Dialogflow Agents from Excel Spreadsheets using Alex2.0 conversion

spreadsheet.description: Path of a spreadsheet in Sharepoint from the Bots directory and relevant sheets

directory.description: Optional sharepoint directory from Bots where spreadsheet is kept (by default data path is used)

sheets.description: Optional names of sheets to use within spreadsheet

dataPath.description: SharePoint path from IDTC Bots folder to the Data directory containing spreadsheets (StudentBot/1. Data)

otherIntents.description: List of dictionaries which detail other intents sheet paths and sheets to use within the intents spreadsheet

otherEntities.description: List of dictionaries which detail other entities sheet paths and sheets to use within the entities spreadsheet
